title: JSON schema for the tested configuration files

___include.description: Specifies a list of glob patterns that match files to be included in compilation.

___exclude.description: Specifies a list globs that need to be excluded from compilation. The 'exclude' property only affects the files included via the 'include' property

___tests.description: The directory where the codelytics rules live

___include.description: Specifies a list of glob patterns that match files to be included in compilation.

___exclude.description: Specifies a list globs that need to be excluded from compilation. The 'exclude' property only affects the files included via the 'include' property
